column3: Isaac Newton discovered the laws of gravity after seeing an apple fall from a tree.
There are many trees in a forest.
I live in a big house.
Going by bike is better for the environment than taking a car.
You sleep best in your ow comfortable bed.
Giving flowers to a girl you like seems romantic, but is actually rather pointless.
You can lock the door to your room if you don't want your siblings coming in.
